Click to schedule a tour. "The finest clubs, like family traditions, trace their roots to strong contributions by individuals. These individuals create the environment in which camaraderie flourishes and new friendships begin. These individuals are called Members.” LIVE THE LEGEND! For membership information, call Chief Operating Officer & Director of Membership, Tom Brun at 262-968-9717. © Copyright 2025. All rights reserved.
